ComicInfo.Title: The Return of the Titan!; The Gypsy's Revenge!; The Speed Demon; I Was Trapped by the Mole Men!; The Voice from Nowhere!; The Man Who Played Dead!
ComicInfo.Summary:
The Return of the Titan!: The Titan returns from space and takes over a small town to get revenge on the human that defeated him. This human tracks him down and uses a mirror to turn the alienâ€™s hypnotic powers back on him and destroy him.
The Gypsy's Revenge!: An American criminal robs an old gypsy man, ignoring his pleas and curses. When he returns to the United States he sees a fortune teller at a circus, and finds the tent suspended in the void, with the fortune teller revealed as the old man.
The Speed Demon: Speedy Sims raced his car so recklessly he is doomed to race around the rings of Saturn forever.
I Was Trapped by the Mole Men!: A subway train full of people goes missing underground. A brash young cop finds that it has been taken by a subterranean race and violently rescues the train. He is shocked to discover that the mysterious people were benevolent, and that he has ruined a golden opportunity to gain knowledge.
The Voice from Nowhere!: A space pilot landing on an asteroid is perplexed by a voice from nowhere pleading for help, but he realizes that the asteroid itself is the source of the voice.
The Man Who Played Dead!: A midget disguises himself as a dummy to gain access to homes to rob them.

ComicInfo.Inker: Dick Ayers,Don Heck,Steve Ditko,Frank Giacoia,Dick Ayers,Don Heck,Steve Ditko
